data.message: Fix Intersphere quiz page with resilient timeout handling: Added AbortController with 8s timeout, graceful skip to next topic on timeout/error, include_quiz=true in API call. Quiz page now handles slow backend gracefully instead of breaking. Created prewarm_quiz.py script for caching quiz data (10 topics warmed successfully). Committed and deployed to Vercel.
data.task: Fix Intersphere quiz page with resilient timeout handling
data.outcome: Added AbortController with 8s timeout, graceful skip to next topic on timeout/error, include_quiz=true in API call. Quiz page now handles slow backend gracefully instead of breaking. Created prewarm_quiz.py script for caching quiz data (10 topics warmed successfully). Committed and deployed to Vercel.
